import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Aboutus from '../../ABOUT US/Aboutus' const Dropdownmenu = ({show,set,drop,dropvalue}) => { const About=()=>{ show(!set) } const change=()=>{ drop(!dropvalue) } return (
